name: Tower of Emunah
description:
Help the cat wizard Emunah ascend the mysterious tower filled with traps and evil spirits galore! Do you have what it takes? 

-

Controls: 

A and D to move. Spacebar to jump! 

-

Sprites by Aadyn Currie, Deonte Charles (DC Harmony), and Brian Winn.

Music by Aadyn Currie and Deonte Charles

SFX provided by Brian Winn

Title art by Aadyn Currie

Engine provided by Brian Winn

-

Added Features:

3 Unique Levels, New Music, Revamped UI, Custom Title Screen, New Sprites
